MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  We are arranging to have engineers investigate the fault, and we hope to have your electricity restored by 09-NOV-2020 16:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the EH43 area of Walkerburn, affecting properties in Caberston Avenue and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete the repair to our underground electricity network on Caberston Avenue, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2:15pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:49pm on Monday, 09 November 2020
